CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverwood Forest}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Peaks}.

VE.A: Azure Coast's housing affordability index in 2011 is {126.07} index.

VE.A: Sunstone Desert's housing affordability index in 1997 is {112.38} index.

VE.Q: What is Silverwood Forest's Housing Affordability Index in 2017?
VE.A: Silverwood Forest's housing affordability index in 2017 is {273.72} index.

VE.Q: What are the housing affordability index of Sunstone Desert, Azure Coast, and Crimson Peaks in 2002?
VE.A: Sunstone Desert's housing affordability index is {114.03} index, Azure Coast's housing affordability index is {113.59} index, Crimson Peaks's housing affordability index is {58.82} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Housing Affordability Index in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total housing affordability index is {609.74} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Housing Affordability Index in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total housing affordability index is {928.77} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Housing Affordability Index exceed 786 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {909.66} index in {2016}, total value was {928.77} index in {2017}, total value was {845.23} index in {2011}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Housing Affordability Index go below 680 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {648.31} index in {2000}, total value was {617.26} index in {1995}, total value was {675.91} index in {2004}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Housing Affordability Index fall between 696 and 770 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {719.45} index in {2009}, total value was {754.03} index in {2005}, total value was {711.36} index in {2001}.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 1996 higher or lower than in 2006?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in {1996} was {lower} than in {2006}.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 2010 higher or lower than in 2017?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in {2010} was {lower} than in {2017}.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2001, was the average total Housing Affordability Index higher or lower than between 2009 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total housing affordability index between {1999} and {2001} was {lower} than between {2009} and {2010}.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 2002 higher or lower than in 2015?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in {2002} was {lower} than in {2015}.
